00056    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00057    /*
00058    * Constructor.
00059    */
00060    McSimulation::McSimulation(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00061     : Simulation(communicator),
00062       system_(),
00063       mcMoveManagerPtr_(0),
00064       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_(0),
00065       paramFilePtr_(0),
00066       isInitialized_(false),
00067       isRestarting_(false)
00068    {
00069       // Set connections between this McSimulation and child McSystem
00070       system().setId(0);
00071       system().setSimulation(*this);
00072       system().setFileMaster(fileMaster());
00073 
00074       // Create McMove and Diagnostic managers
00075       mcMoveManagerPtr_ = new McMoveManager(*this);
00076       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_ = new McDiagnosticManager(*this);
00077 
00078       // Pass Manager<Diagnostic>* to Simulation base class.
00079       setDiagnosticManager(mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00080    }
00081    #endif
00082 
00083    /*
00084    * Constructor.
00085    */
00086    McSimulation::McSimulation()
00087     : Simulation(),
00088       system_(),
00089       mcMoveManagerPtr_(0),
00090       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_(0),
00091       paramFilePtr_(0),
00092       isInitialized_(false),
00093       isRestarting_(false)
00094    {
00095       // Set connections between this McSimulation and child McSystem
00096       system().setId(0);
00097       system().setSimulation(*this);
00098       system().setFileMaster(fileMaster());
00099 
00100       // Create McMove and Diagnostic managers
00101       mcMoveManagerPtr_ = new McMoveManager(*this);
00102       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_ = new McDiagnosticManager(*this);
00103 
00104       // Pass Manager<Diagnostic>* to Simulation base class.
00105       setDiagnosticManager(mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00106    }

00109    * Destructor.

00117    /*
00118    * Process command line options.
00119    */
00120    void McSimulation::setOptions(int argc, char **argv)
00121    {
00122       char* rarg   = 0;
00123       bool  eflag  = false;
00124       bool  rflag  = false;
00125       #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00126       bool  pflag = false;
00127       #endif
00128    
00129       // Read program arguments
00130       int c;
00131       opterr = 0;
00132       while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "epr:")) != -1) {
00133          switch (c) {
00134          case 'e':
00135            eflag = true;
00136            break;
00137          case 'r':
00138            rflag = true;
00139            rarg  = optarg;
00140            break;
00141          #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00142          case 'p':
00143            pflag = true;
00144            break;
00145          #endif
00146          case '?':
00147            std::cout << "Unknown option -" << optopt << std::endl;
00148            UTIL_THROW("Invalid command line option");
00149          }
00150       }
00151    
00152       // Set flag to echo parameters as they are read.
00153       if (eflag) {
00154          Util::ParamComponent::setEcho(true);
00155       }
00156       #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00157       // Set to use a perturbation.
00158       if (pflag) {
00159    
00160          // Set to expect perturbation in the param file.
00161          system().setExpectPerturbation();
00162    
00163          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00164          Util::Log::file() << "Set to read parameters from a single file" 
00165                            << std::endl;
00166          setParamCommunicator();
00167          #endif
00168    
00169       }
00170       #endif
00171       if (rflag) {
00172          std::cout << "Reading restart" << std::endl;
00173          std::cout << "Base file name " << std::string(rarg) << std::endl;
00174          isRestarting_ = true; 
00175          readRestart(std::string(rarg));
00176       }
00177    }
00178 
00179    /*
00180    * Read parameters from file.
00181    */
00182    void McSimulation::readParam(std::istream &in)
00183    {
00184       if (isRestarting_) {
00185          if (isInitialized_) {
00186             return;
00187          }
00188       } else 
00189       if (isInitialized_) {
00190          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readParam when already initialized");
00191       }
00192 
00193       // Record identity of parameter file
00194       paramFilePtr_ = &in;
00195 
00196       readBegin(in,"McSimulation");
00197 
00198       // Read all species, diagnostics, random number seed
00199       Simulation::readParam(in);
00200 
00201       // Read the McSystem parameters: potential parameters, temperature etc.
00202       readParamComposite(in, system());
00203 
00204       // Read Monte Carlo Moves
00205       assert(mcMoveManagerPtr_);
00206       readParamComposite(in, *mcMoveManagerPtr_);
00207 
00208       // Read Diagnostics
00209       readParamComposite(in, diagnosticManager());
00210 
00211       isValid();
00212       isInitialized_ = true;
00213       readEnd(in);
00214    }
00215 
00216    /*
00217    * Read default parameter file.
00218    */
00219    void McSimulation::readParam()
00220    {  readParam(fileMaster().paramFile()); }
00221 
00222    /*
00223    * Read and execute commands from a specified command file.
00224    */
00225    void McSimulation::readCommands(std::istream &in)
00226    {
00227       if (!isInitialized_) {
00228          UTIL_THROW("McSimulation is not initialized");
00229       }
00230 
00231       std::string    command;
00232       std::string    filename;
00233       std::ifstream  inputFile;
00234       std::ofstream  outputFile;
00235 
00236       #ifndef UTIL_MPI
00237       std::istream&     inBuffer = in;
00238       #else
00239       std::stringstream inBuffer;
00240       std::string       line;
00241       #endif
00242 
00243       bool readNext = true;
00244       while (readNext) {
00245 
00246          // fdef   UTIL_MPI, read a line and copy to stringstream inBuffer
00247          // ifndef UTIL_MPI, inBuffer is simply a reference to istream in.
00248 
00249          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00250          // Read a command line, and broadcast if necessary.
00251          if (!hasParamCommunicator() || isParamIoProcessor()) {
00252             getNextLine(in, line);
00253          }
00254          if (hasParamCommunicator()) {
00255             bcast<std::string>(communicator(), line, 0);
00256          }
00257 
00258          // Copy the command line to inBuffer.
00259          inBuffer.clear();
00260          for (unsigned i=0; i < line.size(); ++i) {
00261             inBuffer.put(line[i]);
00262          }
00263          #endif
00264 
00265          inBuffer >> command;
00266          Log::file() << command;
00267 
00268          if (isRestarting_) {
00269 
00270             if (command == "RESTART") {
00271                int endStep;
00272                inBuffer >> endStep;
00273                Log::file() << "  " << iStep_ << " to " 
00274                            << endStep << std::endl;
00275                simulate(endStep, isRestarting_);
00276                isRestarting_ = false;
00277             } else {
00278                UTIL_THROW("Missing RESTART command");
00279             }
00280 
00281          } else {
00282 
00283             if (command == "FINISH") {
00284                Log::file() << std::endl;
00285                readNext = false;
00286             } else
00287             if (command == "SET_CONFIG_IO") {
00288                std::string classname;
00289                inBuffer >> classname;
00290                Log::file() << Str(classname, 15) << std::endl;
00291                system().setConfigIo(classname);
00292             } else
00293             if (command == "READ_CONFIG") {
00294                inBuffer >> filename;
00295                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00296                fileMaster().openInputFile(filename, inputFile);
00297                system().readConfig(inputFile);
00298                inputFile.close();
00299             } else
00300             if (command == "SIMULATE") {
00301                int endStep;
00302                inBuffer >> endStep;
00303                Log::file() << "  " << endStep << std::endl;
00304                bool isContinuation = false;
00305                simulate(endStep, isContinuation);
00306             } else
00307             if (command == "CONTINUE") {
00308                if (iStep_ == 0) {
00309                   UTIL_THROW("Attempt to continue when iStep_ == 0");
00310                }
00311                int endStep;
00312                inBuffer >> endStep;
00313                Log::file() << Int(endStep, 15) << std::endl;
00314                bool isContinuation = true;
00315                simulate(endStep, isContinuation);
00316             } else
00317             if (command == "ANALYZE_DUMPS") {
00318                int min, max;
00319                inBuffer >> min >> max >> filename;
00320                Log::file() << "  " <<  min << "  " <<  max
00321                            << "  " <<  filename << std::endl;
00322                analyze(min, max, filename);
00323             } else
00324             if (command == "WRITE_CONFIG") {
00325                inBuffer >> filename;
00326                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00327                fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile);
00328                system().writeConfig(outputFile);
00329                outputFile.close();
00330             } else
00331             if (command == "WRITE_PARAM") {
00332                inBuffer >> filename;
00333                Log::file() << "  " << filename << std::endl;
00334                fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile);
00335                writeParam(outputFile);
00336                outputFile.close();
00337             } else 
00338             if (command == "GENERATE_MOLECULES") {
00339                double boxL;
00340                DArray<double> exclusionRadius;
00341                DArray<int> nMolecule;
00342                exclusionRadius.allocate(nAtomType());
00343                nMolecule.allocate(nSpecies());
00344                inBuffer >> boxL;
00345                Log::file() << "  " << boxL;
00346                for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00347                   inBuffer >> nMolecule[iSpecies];
00348                   Log::file() << "  " << nMolecule[iSpecies];
00349                }
00350                for (int iType=0; iType < nAtomType(); iType++) {
00351                   inBuffer >> exclusionRadius[iType];
00352                   Log::file() << "  " << exclusionRadius[iType];
00353                }
00354                Log::file() << std::endl;
00355                Boundary boundary;
00356                boundary.setCubicLengths(boxL);
00357                for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00358                   species(iSpecies).generateMolecules(
00359                      nMolecule[iSpecies], exclusionRadius, system(),
00360                      &system().bondPotential(),
00361                      boundary);   
00362                }
00363                #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR 
00364                // Generate cell list
00365                system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00366                #endif
00367             } else
00368             #ifndef UTIL_MPI
00369             if (command == "SET_PAIR") {
00370                std::string paramName;
00371                int typeId1, typeId2; 
00372                double value;
00373                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId1 >> typeId2 >> value;
00374                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName 
00375                            << "  " <<  typeId1 << "  " <<  typeId2
00376                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00377                system().pairPotential()
00378                        .set(paramName, typeId1, typeId2, value);
00379             } else 
00380             if (command == "SET_BOND") {
00381                std::string paramName;
00382                int typeId; 
00383                double value;
00384                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00385                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00386                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00387                system().bondPotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00388             } else 
00389             #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00390             if (command == "SET_ANGLE") {
00391                std::string paramName;
00392                int typeId; 
00393                double value;
00394                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00395                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00396                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00397                system().anglePotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00398             } else 
00399             #endif
00400             #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00401             if (command == "SET_DIHEDRAL") {
00402                std::string paramName;
00403                int typeId; 
00404                double value;
00405                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00406                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00407                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00408                system().dihedralPotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00409             } else 
00410             #endif
00411             #endif
00412             {
00413                Log::file() << "  Error: Unknown command  " << std::endl;
00414                readNext = false;
00415             }
00416 
00417          }
00418       }
00419    }

00421    /*
00422    * Read and execute commands from the default command file.
00423    */
00424    void McSimulation::readCommands()
00425    {  readCommands(fileMaster().commandFile()); }
00426 
00427    /*
00428    * Run this MC simulation.
00429    */
00430    void McSimulation::simulate(int endStep, bool isContinuation)
00431    {
00432       if (!isInitialized_) {
00433          UTIL_THROW("McSimulation not initialized");
00434       }
00435 
00436       if (isContinuation) {
00437          Log::file() << "Restarting from iStep = " << iStep_ << std::endl;
00438       } else {
00439          iStep_ = 0;
00440          diagnosticManager().setup();
00441          mcMoveManagerPtr_->setup();
00442       }
00443       int beginStep = iStep_;
00444       int nStep = endStep - beginStep;
00445       Log::file() << std::endl;
00446 
00447       // Main Monte Carlo loop
00448       Timer timer;
00449       timer.start();
00450       for ( ; iStep_ < endStep; ++iStep_) {
00451 
00452          // Sample diagnostics
00453          if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00454             if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00455                diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00456             }
00457          }
00458 
00459          // Choose and attempt an McMove
00460          mcMoveManagerPtr_->chooseMove().move();
00461 
00462          #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00463          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00464          // Attempt replica move, if any.
00465          if (system().hasPerturbation()) {
00466             if (system().hasReplicaMove()) {
00467                if (system().replicaMove().isAtInterval(iStep_)) {
00468                   bool success = system().replicaMove().move();
00469                   #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00470                   if (success) {
00471                      system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00472                   }
00473                   #endif
00474                }
00475             }
00476          }
00477          #endif
00478          #endif
00479 
00480       }
00481       timer.stop();
00482       double time = timer.time();
00483 
00484       // Final diagnostic sample
00485       assert(iStep_ == endStep);
00486       if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00487          if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00488             diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00489          }
00490       }
00491 
00492       // Output results of all diagnostics to output files
00493       diagnosticManager().output();
00494 
00495       // Output results of move statistics to files
00496       mcMoveManagerPtr_->output();
00497 
00498       // Output time for the run
00499       Log::file() << std::endl;
00500       Log::file() << "endStep       " << endStep << std::endl;
00501       Log::file() << "nStep         " << nStep << std::endl;
00502       Log::file() << "run time      " << time
00503                   << " sec" << std::endl;
00504       double rStep = double(nStep);
00505       Log::file() << "time / nStep  " <<  time / rStep
00506                   << " sec" << std::endl;
00507       Log::file() << std::endl;
00508 
00509       // Print McMove acceptance statistics
00510       long attempt;
00511       long accept;
00512       using namespace std;
00513       Log::file() << "Move Statistics:" << endl << endl;
00514       Log::file() << setw(32) << left <<  "Move Name"
00515            << setw(12) << right << "Attempted"
00516            << setw(12) << right << "Accepted"
00517            << setw(15) << right << "AcceptRate"
00518            << endl;
00519       int nMove = mcMoveManagerPtr_->size();
00520       for (int iMove = 0; iMove < nMove; ++iMove) {
00521          attempt = (*mcMoveManagerPtr_)[iMove].nAttempt();
00522          accept  = (*mcMoveManagerPtr_)[iMove].nAccept();
00523          Log::file() << setw(32) << left 
00524               << mcMoveManagerPtr_->className(iMove)
00525               << setw(12) << right << attempt
00526               << setw(12) << accept
00527               << setw(15) << fixed << setprecision(6)
00528               << ( attempt == 0 ? 0.0 : double(accept)/double(attempt) )
00529               << endl;
00530       }
00531       Log::file() << endl;
00532 
00533       #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00534       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00535       // Print replica-exchange acceptance statistics
00536       if (system().hasPerturbation()) {
00537          if (system().hasReplicaMove()) {
00538   
00539             double ratio; 
00540             int    nAttempt, nAccept;
00541    
00542             nAttempt = system().replicaMove().nAttempt();
00543             nAccept = system().replicaMove().nAccept();
00544             ratio = nAttempt == 0 ? 0.0 : double(nAccept)/double(nAttempt);
00545             Log::file() << "Replica Exchange "
00546                         << Int(nAttempt) << Int(nAccept) << Dbl(ratio)
00547                         << std::endl;
00548          }
00549       }
00550       #endif
00551       #endif
00552 
00553    }
00554 
00555    /*
00556    * Read and analyze a sequence of configuration files.
00557    */
00558    void McSimulation::analyze(int min, int max, std::string dumpPrefix)
00559    {
00560       // Preconditions
00561       if (min < 0)    UTIL_THROW("min < 0");
00562       if (max < min)  UTIL_THROW("max < min");
00563 
00564       Timer             timer;
00565       std::string       filename;
00566       std::stringstream indexString;
00567       std::ifstream     configFile;
00568       int               nConfig;
00569       nConfig = max - min + 1;
00570 
00571       // Main loop
00572       Log::file() << "begin main loop" << std::endl;
00573       timer.start();
00574       for (iStep_ = min; iStep_ <= max; ++iStep_) {
00575 
00576          indexString << iStep_;
00577          filename = dumpPrefix;
00578          filename += indexString.str();
00579          fileMaster().openInputFile(filename, configFile);
00580 
00581          // Clear the stringstream
00582          indexString.str("");
00583 
00584          system().readConfig(configFile);
00585          configFile.close();
00586 
00587          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00588          // Build the system CellList
00589          system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00590          #endif
00591 
00592          #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00593          isValid();
00594          #endif
00595 
00596          // Initialize diagnostics (taking in molecular information).
00597          if (iStep_ == min) diagnosticManager().setup();
00598 
00599          // Sample property values
00600          diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00601 
00602          // Clear out the System for the next readConfig.
00603          system().removeAllMolecules();
00604 
00605       }
00606       timer.stop();
00607       Log::file() << "end main loop" << std::endl;
00608 
00609       // Output results of all diagnostics to output files
00610       diagnosticManager().output();
00611 
00612       // Output time
00613       Log::file() << std::endl;
00614       Log::file() << "nConfig       " << nConfig << std::endl;
00615       Log::file() << "run time      " << timer.time()
00616                   << "  sec" << std::endl;
00617       Log::file() << "time / config " << timer.time()/double(nConfig)
00618                   << "  sec" << std::endl;
00619       Log::file() << std::endl;
00620 
00621       iStep_ = 0;
00622    }
00623 
00624    void McSimulation::writeRestart(const std::string& filename)
00625    {
00626       std::ofstream out;
00627       fileMaster().openParamOFile(filename, ".prm", out);
00628       writeParam(out);
00629       out.close();
00630 
00631       fileMaster().openRestartOFile(filename, ".rst", out);
00632       Serializable::OArchiveType ar;
00633       ar.setStream(out);
00634       ar & random();
00635       ar & system();
00636       ar & iStep_;
00637       mcMoveManagerPtr_->save(ar);
00638       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_->save(ar);
00639       out.close();
00640    }
00641 
00642    void McSimulation::readRestart(const std::string& filename)
00643    {
00644       if (isInitialized_) {
00645          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readRestart when already initialized");
00646       }
00647       if (!isRestarting_) {
00648          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readRestart without restart option");
00649       }
00650 
00651       // Open and read parameter (*.prm) file
00652       std::ifstream in;
00653       fileMaster().openParamIFile(filename, ".prm", in);
00654       readParam(in);
00655       in.close();
00656 
00657       // Open restart (*.rst) file and associate with an archive
00658       fileMaster().openRestartIFile(filename, ".rst", in);
00659       Serializable::IArchiveType ar;
00660       ar.setStream(in);
00661 
00662       // Load state from restart file
00663       ar & random();
00664       system().load(ar);
00665       ar & iStep_;
00666       mcMoveManagerPtr_->load(ar);
00667       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_->load(ar);
00668       in.close();
00669 
00670       std::string commandFileName = filename + ".cmd";
00671       fileMaster().setCommandFileName(commandFileName);
00672       //fileMaster().openParamIFile(filename, ".cmd", in);
00673       //readCommands(in);
00674       //in.close();
00675    }
00676 
00677    /*
00678    * Get the McMove factory.
00679    */
00680    Factory<McMove>& McSimulation::mcMoveFactory()
00681    {  return mcMoveManagerPtr_->factory(); }
00682 
00683    /*
00684    * Check validity: return true if valid, or throw Exception.
00685    */
00686    bool McSimulation::isValid() const
00687    {
00688       Simulation::isValid();
00689       system().isValid();
00690 
00691       if (&system().simulation() != this) {
00692          UTIL_THROW("Invalid pointer to Simulation in System");
00693       }
00694 
00695       return true;
00696    }
00697 
00698 }
